data.name: Neutrino
data.detailed_description:
Neutrino - a minimalist game where a photon seeks the core of Neutrinos Kingdom, find out why they have mass and destroy them!

For those who like Pong, Neutrino is like that in steroids. Neutrino has over 120 different rooms and 12 different abilities to explore, you must always find a way to hit your photon into the black hole without touching any red neutrino.

For that, all you have is an aim, the timer and your own gut feeling.

Once you unlocked a level, you can chose to start from there in the next adventure, instead of starting from zero.

Try it yourself!

data.short_description: Neutrino, The Mission - a minimalist game where a photon seeks the core of Neutrinos Kingdom, find out why they have mass and destroy them!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 (or newer)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 4th generation or similar
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 520 or similar
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: macOS 12.4 (or newer)
  • Processor: Apple M1 Max (or similar)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal-capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04, Ubuntu 18.04, and CentOS 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 4th generation or similar
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+ or Vulkan-capable, Nvidia, and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
